LocaleResource.Name: Plugins.Description.SmartStore.Shipping
LocaleResource.Value: Provides shipping methods for fixed rate shipping and computation based on weight.

LocaleResource.Name: AddNewRecord.Success
LocaleResource.Value: The new record was successfully added.

LocaleResource.Name: Fields.Country.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: If an asterisk is selected, then this shipping rate will apply to all customers, regardless of the country.

LocaleResource.Name: Fields.StateProvince.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: If an asterisk is selected, then this shipping rate will apply to all customers from the given country, regardless of the state / province.

LocaleResource.Name: Fields.Zip.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Zip/postal code (range), either as specific values (comma devided) or range pattern (e.g. 4000-4999). You can also define wildcard chars like * or ?. If zip is empty, then this shipping rate will apply to all customers from the given country or state / province, regardless of the zip code. You can also enter multiple ranges (comma devided)

LocaleResource.Name: Fields.UsePercentage.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Check the box to use 'charge percentage' value.

LocaleResource.Name: Fields.LimitMethodsToCreated
LocaleResource.Value: Limit shipping methods to configured ones

LocaleResource.Name: Fields.LimitMethodsToCreated.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: If you check this option, then your customers will be limited to shipping options configured here. Otherwise, they'll be able to choose any existing shipping options even if they're not configured here (zero shipping fee in this case).

LocaleResource.Name: Fields.CalculateTotalIncludingTax.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Specifies whether to calculate the order total including or excluding taxes.

LocaleResource.Name: Fields.MaxCharge.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: An amount that the calculated shipping costs may not exceed.

LocaleResource.Name: Fields.SmallQuantityThreshold.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Subtotal up to which a "small quantity surcharge" should be added. The surcharge will be ignored if no shipping fee is applied. Use "0" if no fee will be charged.

LocaleResource.Name: Fields.Store.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: If an asterisk is selected, then this shipping rate will apply to all stores.
